subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Lee was all smiles around his former Brewers teammates Geoff Jenkins and Bill Hall. Meanwhile, Lee’s new manager, Phil Garner, compared him to some of the past greats in Milwaukee.
snippet: Carlos Lee was all smiles around his former Brewers teammates Geoff Jenkins and Bill Hall. Meanwhile, Lee’s new manager, Phil Garner, compared him to some of the past greats in Milwaukee.
